About Me

Web
About

I'm a product designer working in Beijing. I provide customers with design consulting work, to help customers overall, professional, digital design.

Web UI/UX Design | Mobile UI/UX Design

My Story
interest in design at college
01
Why design

When I was young, I was very interested in the computer and I had been dreaming of becoming a hacker or development engineer, because I thought they were cool! But my college majors are art-related. There are many designs related to human-computer interaction, so I started to be interested in the design.

My Story
designer to developers to full-stack
02
Better design

Luckily, I had the opportunity to practice at Accenture, which enabled me to maintain good working habits. After graduation, I joined a start-up company, so I have more opportunities to achieve bold design. My goal is to be an independent developer, I am good at integrating my various skills together to play out more power, such as design, code and 3D animation, I like to create the process.
